Class UserValidator

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.cinephile.validation.UserValidator
public class UserValidator extends Object
Utility class for validating User objects and credentials.

    • validateUser

      public static boolean validateUser(User user) throws ValidationException
      Validates a User object.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be validated.
      Returns:
      True if the User is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If the User details are not valid.

      public static boolean validateLogIn(User user) throws ValidationException
      Validates a User object for login.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object representing login credentials.
      Returns:
      True if the User object is valid for login, false otherwise.
